DOC.brief_summary: The project study compare effectiveness two topical anesthetic control pain associate dental needle insertion palatal mucosa . A standard dental topical anesthetic ( 20 % benzocaine ) serve `` active '' control compare combination topical anesthetic , consist 20 % lidocaine , 4 % tetracaine 2 % phenylephrine ( TAC Alternate Gel , Compounding Arts Pharmacy , Lafayette , LA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Efficacy 20 % Benzocaine Versus TAC Alternate Gel
DOC.criteria: 1 . Volunteers 18 year old 2 . Ability consent participate research 3 . Ability communicate VAS score 4 . Generally healthy , ASA I ASA II 5 . No known drug allergy 6 . Ability tolerate pulse oximeter blood pressure cuff without psychological , physiological consequence 1 . Allergy contraindication topical anesthetic 2 . Inability consent participation study 3 . Use analgesic prior procedure 4 . Vulnerable population
